title: [Large-Scale] Introduction to HCI Development for Mobile-Based Language Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage experience and language learning fundamentals
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environments through personal device utilization, strengthening practical competencies via project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can produce a mobile language-learning interface prototype by applying visual design principles (color, layout, typography).
Learners can plan microlearning content that considers learning efficiency using UX design techniques.
Learners can analyze interaction elements of language-learning apps based on HCI theories (cognitive load, activity theory).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
